verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Jesus is coming soon
Morning or night or noon

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Many will meet their doom
Trumpets will sound

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
All of the dead shall rise
Righteous meet in the skies

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines:
Going where no one dies
Heavenward bound

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Troublesome times are here
Filling men's hearts with fear

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Freedom we all hold dear
Now is at stake

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Humbling your hearts to God
Saves from the chast'ning rod

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Seek the way pilgrims trod
Christians awake

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Troubles will soon be o'er
Happy forevermore

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
When we meet on that shore
Free from all care

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
Rising up in the sky
Telling this world goodbye

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines:
Homeward we then will fly
Glory to share

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Love of so many cold
Losing their home of gold

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
This in God's word is told
Evils abound

verse.name: v3c
verse.lines:
When these signs come to pass
Nearing the end at last

verse.name: v3d
verse.lines:
It will come very fast
Trumpets will sound
